bibl.title: The Northern Sinai from the 7th Century BC till the 7th Century AD. A Guide to the Sources.
bibl.note: Volume I. - Introduction. - 1. Itineraries and descriptions of the northern Sinai. - 2. Lake Serbonis, the Kasiotis and the Djifar. - 3. The area between Raphia and Rinokoloura. - 4. Rinokoloura. - 5. Ostrakine. - 6. Kasion. - 7. The coastal area between Kasion and Pelousion. - 8. The inland road south of Sabkhat Bardawil. - 9. The northwestern Sinai. - 10. Pelousion and the Pelousiac plain [partim]. - Volume II. - Bibliography, maps, illustrations, sources, texts found in situ and orthographic variants for the sites mentioned in the gazetteer. - Prosopography of the northern Sinai from the 7th century BC till the 7th century AD. - Maps related to the northern Sinai. Bibliography.
